resources.string: Buy USB OTG cabel and connect it to your Android device.
Connect Android device with Arduino board.
Servo Controller should popup automatically and Arduino TX LED should start blinking.
Connect ESC or Servo white signal wire to Arduino pin 2, red +5v, black GND and start mooving sliders.
If nothing happens when you connect Arduino to your Adnroid device than either your device does not support USB Host mode or you have not connected a valid OTG USB cable.
